rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen and dining area. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to enhance natural light, adhering to Kerala-style aesthetics.
Open-plan kitchen attached to the living room. Designed for ease of movement with floor-to-ceiling windows and modern amenities, following Kerala design principles.
Primary bedroom featuring ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu aligned for positive energy.
Secondary bedroom designed with Kerala aesthetic and functional space for a family member.
Additional secondary bedroom following Kerala style, ensuring sufficient space and privacy.
Dedicated servant's quarters located near the service area to facilitate easy movement.
Master bathroom integrated with master bedroom. Designed with privacy and Vastu principles in mind.
Utility room for storage of kitchen appliances and cleaning supplies, maintaining functionality without disrupting the open-plan flow.

openings.description: Main entrance with traditional Kerala style design featuring arches and ample lighting.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south side to maximize natural light, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Floor-to-ceiling windows oriented to ensure positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Dedicated entry for servants, ensuring separate circulation from the main living spaces.
